title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 408.1 - Scope
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 408.1 - Scope

State Regulations

The provisions of this Part apply to per diem rates
payable by social services districts to residential programs for victims of
domestic violence, as defined in Parts 452-455 of this Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
408.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
